metadata.title: CVE-2021-3407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in mupdf 1.18.0. Double free of object duringlinearization may lead to memory corruption and other potentialconsequences.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
